name: Hand Washing Simulator 2020
description:
Welcome to Hand Washing Simulator 2020! In this exciting new game full of twists and turns, you'll be able to:

  • Wash you hands for 20 seconds
  • Get a rank based on how well you washed your hands
  • Listen to a MIDI of Happy Birthday I found online
  • And possibly more! Probably not, but who knows!

    • (If you're interested in experiencing the magical world of hand-washing in real life, and you should be, please read this page by the WHO!)

    CONTROLS:
    WASD - Left hand
    Arrow keys - Right hand

    Music from bitmidi.com, with soundfonts from FreePats.
    Made with Fusion 2.5
